desc: Guo Jewellery is Toronto's full service of jewellery and watch repairs. Custom designed, made to order silver, gold, diamond, and semi-precious gem jewellery. Ready off self rings, earrings, necklaces, chains, pendants, bracelets, and more. Buy, trade, and sell gold. Domestic and international shipping available.

layout.text: We're extremely lucky to be a small part of thousands of ceremonies uniting people from different cultures, backgrounds, and customs, and what better way to tie the knot? Responsibly sourced from the US, Italy, Switzerland, Hong Kong, and proudly made in Canada.
